casebody.data:
VITO LEMONGELLI, PETITIONER-RESPONDENT, v. THE CARLSON COMPANY, RESPONDENT-PROSECUTOR. Argued January 16, 1935 Decided April 15, 1935.

Before Justices Heher and Perskie.

For the prosecutor, Kalisch & Kalisch. For the respondent, Cohen <& Klein. Per Curiam.

Our study of the record submitted, leads us to the conclusion that it presents no debatable question, and accordingly the writ of certiorari is denied.
